meanings.definition: A photographic process for producing prints in color from a monochrome original.
meanings.sent1: I learned about autotypes in my photography class.
meanings.sent2: The autotypes of the flowers looked so vibrant and realistic.
meanings.sent3: The autotypes of the animals seemed to come to life on the paper.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like autotypes, capturing moments in vivid detail.
meanings.sent5: The autotypes of the sunset were so beautiful, they almost looked real.

meanings.definition: A print produced by the autotype process.
meanings.sent1: She collected autotypes of famous paintings for her art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The autotypes of the landscape were displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The autotypes of the comic characters made her laugh every time.
meanings.sent4: His words were like autotypes, leaving a lasting impression on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The autotypes of the city skyline were so detailed, it felt like being there.
